resources.string: Press the button when \nthe ring around it appears
Welcome to the AR Page: 10 pollen to start!
10 Pollens are required to start the game, are you sure you want to continue?
Are you sure you want to leave the game?
Mindfulness breathing involves taking slow, deep breaths while being aware of yourself, your feelings, and your surroundings

As you do the mindfulness walking activity, pay attention to your surroundings as you interact with nature and look for elements that remind you of what you have thought about in the meditation activity. As you walk, take time to reflect on your positive associations with the natural elements that you see

Mindfulness meditation involves grounding yourself with your surroundings and the earth by taking mindful breaths and thinking about nature. The exercise presents you with relaxing music to listen to as you focus on nature and your presence in the world

Visiting the atrium gives you the opportunity to reflect on what you have learned from each of the mindfulness activities. Each butterfly in the atrium has its own quote that relates to what you have learned by using the app. As you read the quotes in the atrium, take time to review the concepts you have learned and practiced so far

Practicing mindfulness means that you are aware of your thoughts, feelings (both emotional and physical), and surroundings. By participating in the mindfulness activities (breathing, meditation, and walking), you can learn about mindfulness and how to practice it

There are several activities within ARORA that encourage you to learn about mindful awareness. Superfly, a cooperative AR game, allows you to practice your mindful awareness. By playing Superfly, you practice mindfulness skills such as being aware of your teammateâ€™s needs, your own needs, and your surroundings

The butterfly is meaningful in many ways, varying between different people. Overall our participants told us that butterflies represented growth, positivity, and grace in both Hopi and Navajo cultures. They also appear to represent the transformations that everyone goes through, as well as transitions, such as to different points of their lives or to different phases of life

A sense of place and connection with the earth has significant cultural importance. Superfly involves walking around in nature, connecting with the earth, and collaborating with others to achieve a common goal. When playing Superfly with others, you work together, rather than competing against one another

Mindfulness practices, including affirmations, are consistent with traditional Indigenous beliefs and relate to Indigenious cultural teachings. By practicing affirmations, you can instill positive beliefs within yourself and improve your self-esteem
How stressed do you feel today?
press and hold green button - when you breathe in. release the button - when breathing out.
